typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Aggregate1 unpivot(output(
		avg_genre as string,
		avgrating as double
	),
	ungroupBy(year),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avg_comedy = avgIf(split(lower(genres),'|')[1]=='comedy',Rating),
		avg_drama = avgIf(split(lower(genres),'|')[1]=='drama',Rating),
		avg_action = avgIf(split(lower(genres),'|')[1]=='action',Rating)) ~> Aggregate1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
